name: ipnuo-backend
description: NestJS backend bootstrap for IPNuo migration

scripts.start:dev: npm run build && node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register dist/main.js
scripts.start:prod: npm run prisma:migrate:deploy && cd ../.. && TS_NODE_PROJECT=apps/backend/tsconfig.json TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module":"commonjs"}' NODE_PATH=.:packages:apps/backend/node_modules node -r ./apps/backend/scripts/require-hook.js -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register apps/backend/dist/main.js
scripts.build: (npm run prisma:generate || echo 'Prisma generate skipped') && nest build && node scripts/fix-requires.js && node scripts/verify-fix.js
scripts.build:skip-prisma: nest build && node scripts/fix-requires.js && node scripts/verify-fix.js
scripts.prisma:migrate:resolve: cd ../../packages/prisma && (npx prisma migrate resolve --rolled-back 20250128000000_add_whatsapp_models --schema ./schema.prisma 2>/dev/null; npx prisma migrate resolve --rolled-back 20251020043108_add_memory_system --schema ./schema.prisma 2>/dev/null; npx prisma migrate resolve --rolled-back 20251021193000_add_trademark_registry --schema ./schema.prisma 2>/dev/null; npx prisma migrate resolve --rolled-back 20251023222647_add_tenant_chatbot_models --schema ./schema.prisma 2>/dev/null; npx prisma migrate resolve --applied 20251028130000_add_chat_contacts --schema ./schema.prisma 2>/dev/null || npx prisma migrate resolve --rolled-back 20251028130000_add_chat_contacts --schema ./schema.prisma 2>/dev/null; npx prisma migrate resolve --rolled-back 20251101120000_finalize_user_management --schema ./schema.prisma 2>/dev/null; npx prisma migrate resolve --applied 20251105000000_add_whatsapp_models --schema ./schema.prisma 2>/dev/null || npx prisma migrate resolve --rolled-back 20251105000000_add_whatsapp_models --schema ./schema.prisma 2>/dev/null; npx prisma migrate resolve --rolled-back 20251117000001_create_user_role_enum --schema ./schema.prisma 2>/dev/null; npx prisma migrate resolve --applied 20251115000000_create_departments_table --schema ./schema.prisma 2>/dev/null || npx prisma migrate resolve --rolled-back 20251115000000_create_departments_table --schema ./schema.prisma 2>/dev/null; npx prisma migrate resolve --applied 20251116000000_add_department_id_to_users --schema ./schema.prisma 2>/dev/null || npx prisma migrate resolve --rolled-back 20251116000000_add_department_id_to_users --schema ./schema.prisma 2>/dev/null; npx prisma migrate resolve --rolled-back 20251117000000_create_admin_user --schema ./schema.prisma 2>/dev/null || echo 'Admin user migration skipped (not needed)'; echo 'Migration resolve attempts completed')
scripts.postinstall: npm run prisma:generate || echo 'Prisma generate skipped (packages/prisma not available)'
